channel.title: Npc emote

item.title: Npc emote
item.dc:creator: @Deviation_Scape Deviation Scape
item.description:
@Deviation_Scape wrote:

… If you insist.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 24, 2007, 12:06:36 PM[/size][hr][quote=“cheese8, post:2, topic:115942”]try switching the npcid and the anim number… like this:

you have it like this:

npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 2066; // Dharok attack if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2026) {// Dharok hitDiff = misc.random(59); }

make it look like this:

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2026) {// Dharok npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 2066; // Dharok attack hitDiff = misc.random(59); } [/quote]
Note anyone else. I would appreciate it if someone would post.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc emote
item.dc:creator: @cheese8 cheese8
item.description:
@cheese8 wrote:

try switching the npcid and the anim number… like this:

you have it like this:

npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 2066; // Dharok attack if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2026) {// Dharok hitDiff = misc.random(59); }

make it look like this:

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2026) {// Dharok npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 2066; // Dharok attack hitDiff = misc.random(59); }

Read full topic

item.title: Npc emote
item.dc:creator: @Deviation_Scape Deviation Scape
item.description:
@Deviation_Scape wrote:

Ok, i added this in NpcHandler.java

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2025) {// Ahrim hitDiff = misc.random(21); } npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 2066; // Dharok attack if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2026) {// Dharok hitDiff = misc.random(59); } npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 2062; // Verac attack if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2030) {// Verac hitDiff = misc.random(23); } npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 2080; // Guthan Poke if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2027) {// Guthan hitDiff = misc.random(26); } npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 2075; // Karil Shoot if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2028) {// Karil hitDiff = misc.random(18); } npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 2068; // Torag Attack if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2029) {// Torag hitDiff = misc.random(20); } npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 2653; // Jad Stomp if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2745) {// Jad hitDiff = misc.random(91); }

When i logg on, all the barrows monsters does the Jad Stomp emote. Why is this?

Read full topic
